info.author: Sebastien Saurin, Christophe Hurlin, Christophe Perignon, supported by Awais Sani and Gaëtan Brison
info.name: XPER
info.summary: XPER (eXplainable PERformance) is a methodology designed      to measure the specific contribution of the input features to      the predictive performance of any econometric or machine learning model.
